name: Grade Runner
description:
JOURNEY THROUGH THIS RETROWAVE ENVIRONMENT AND EXPLORE THE REALMS OF YOUR KNOWLEDGE! YOU HAVE 5 LIVES TO ANSWER AS MANY QUESTIONS AS POSSIBLE. THE HIGHER YOU SCORE, THE MORE LIKELY YOU ARE TO BEAT YOUR FRIENDS

How to play

Controls
Left - Left Arrow Key

Right - Right Arrow Key

Objectives

  1. See Question
  2. Drive through answer
  3. Get points
  4. Repeat
  5. Repeat 5 times to get a multiplier
  6. Impress friends with your big brain scores

Dont fall off the track

Dont crash into the obstacle

Dont get five questions wrong
